system.description: Effect: Magnitude's Power is variable. Each time it's used, it has a 5% chance of having 10 Power, 10% of 30, 20% of 50, 30% of 70, 20% of 90, 10% of 110, and 5% of 150. If a target is Burrowed underground, Magnitude ignores range increment and the target's EVA stage increases. Additionally, Magnitude's Power is doubled against Burrowed targets.
